"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b1584d6368726f0f0000b4#post_55b1584d6368726f0f0000b4

I'm multitasking like crazy right now. And what's worse, I really just want to do _more_ work. Preferably writing. I'm itching like nuts to write. 

When my mind zooms to twenty different places at once, I get a little...overwhelmed.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
Power rangers in space is kind of weird.

Megaranger had next to nothing to do with space.

It was a tech themed sentai about a group of Teens who are really good at an arcade game called "Megaranger", And it turns out that It's actually a combat simulator to find a group of five people to fight aliens from another dimension called the Nejireija. (Themed around literal twists)

The Rangers each have tech related powers. (PC for Red, Digital satellite for black, Digital TV for blue, Digital camera for yellow, And Cell phone for pink.)

The Mecha were really the only thing space related.
